info.name: Orb of Snakes
info.description: The construction for my custom Orb of Snakes.
info.author: Gustavo Schip

description.p: This orb appears to have a snake eye inside that glows a bright yellow and weighs 20 pounds. Hissing sounds can be heard from the orb when it is shaken.

You can use an action to try to interact with the orb. Make a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw, if you succeeded the saving throw, target a creature to transform into a snake with a effect you determine by rolling a d4, the transformation acts similarly to the polymorph spell. The creature returns to its original form at the next dawn or when it is reduced to 0 hit points. If you failed the saving throw, you are transformed into a snake under the DM's control.

The snake is under your control and is friendly to your companions, and it acts on your turn. You can command how the snake moves and what action it takes on its next turn, or to give it general orders, such as to attack your enemies. In the absence of such orders, the snake acts in a fashion appropriate to its nature.
The snakes use the Poisonous Snake stat block.
Once three targets have been transformed with the orb, the orb can't be used again until the next dawn.

Curse. if a Human or a 'half' human uses this item successfully, it causes them to transform into the Yuan-ti pureblood race, this change is permanent. While being cursed this way, their alignment changes to Chaotic Evil and they worship Zehir as their deity.

tr.td: Growth spurt, the snake becomes huge, making it a Giant Poisonous Snake.
Primal instincts, the snake only acts in a fashion appropriate to its nature.
Sprouting wings, the snake grows wings, making it a Flying Snake.
Comfortable form, the transformation is prolonged for 1d4 + 1 dawns.
